attributes.action: Please get the Olympics sorted out !!!!!!!!!!
attributes.additional_details:
Everything the organizers have done so far for the Olympics is a joke, I think i could have done a better job on it myself and im not even 18.

Things i think are ruining it.

-Logo (it looks aweful)
-posters (they dont have anything to do with it)
mascots (great that will make the younger population happy two f**king dildos )
-the whole idea of the ticket sales.
-overselling
-MANY MORE
all in all im just not going to watch it because it will be one giant Cockup and i think many people share my views  SORT IT OUT!!!!!

rejection.details: Preparation for the Olympics is a matter for LOCOG.
